contents:
ORDER
And now, this 28th day of April, 1975, the Order dated April 1, 1975, of the Court of Common Pleas of Luzerne County setting aside and declaring void the Nomination Petition of the Appellant, James F. LaVerdi, Jr., for the office of School Director for the Pittston Area School District, is affirmed.
Majority opinion and dissenting opinion to follow.
The Order of this Court, dated April 21, 1975, is hereby vacated.
